pullrequest.title: use sandia-hand package and generate atlas robot from xacro at build time

content.raw:
Is it possible to get rid of the these error messages:

    Error [gazebo_ros_camera_utils.cpp:126] left_camera_optical_frame

    Error [SandiaHandPlugin.cpp:56] Loading SandiaHandPlugin

    Error [SandiaHandPlugin.cpp:195] Deferred Loading SandiaHandPlugin

    Error [AtlasPlugin.cpp:239] Deferred Loading AtlasPlugin
